Name: West Africa
Description: The Republic of Angola, is a country on the west coast of Southern Africa. It is the seventh-largest country in Africa, Independence was achieved in 1975. Angola has vast mineral and petroleum reserves, and its economy is among the fastest-growing in the world, since the end of the civil war; however, the standard of living remains low for most of the population, and life expectancy in Angola is among the lowest in the world, while infant mortality is among the highest.
